name: Birds&Stones
description:
The story is that you are trying to get rid of the enemy birds that stole your food the day before and now they are waiting to do it again. But this time you are ready to stop them. You equip yourself with your trusty slingshot and position yourself at the lookout tower, determined to defend your stash of food.

Controls:

Shoot - Space

Exit the level - Esc

To play:

Download the zip file.

Extract all components in a separate folder.

Open the game and have fun.
